nodes.text: The banks are winning in their campaign to cut their costs by changing the way we handle money and pay our bills.
They are keeping us out of their branches killing off the cheque moving us onto the internet making money less tangible and pushing us towards the cashless economy.

If the banks are keeping us out of their branches killing off the cheque moving us onto the internet making money less tangible and pushing us towards a cashless economy then they are winning their campaign to cut their costs by changing the way we handle money and pay our bills.
